data: “He has not made his appearance in the office to-day!” exclaimed Mr. Passmore, the working partner in an ironware manufactory in Seville.
"He has not made his appearance in the office to-day!" exclaimed Mr. Passmore, the working partner in an ironware manufactory in Seville.
The Spanish Cavalier: A Story of Seville
